scripts.package: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js && vue-cli-service electron:build -p never
scripts.dev: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js && vue-cli-service electron:serve --disable-background-timer-throttling
scripts.cross-package-win: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js win32 x64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --win --x64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-win32: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js win32 ia32 && vue-cli-service electron:build --win --ia32 -p never
scripts.cross-package-mac: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js darwin && vue-cli-service electron:build --mac -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux x64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --x64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux-arm64: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux arm64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --arm64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux-mips64el: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux mips64el && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --arm64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux-loongarch64: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux loong64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --arm64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux-sw64: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux sw_64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --arm64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-all: node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/del.js ./dist_electron && npm run cross-package-mac && npm run cross-package-win && npm run cross-package-win32 && npm run cross-package-linux && npm run cross-package-linux-arm64
